description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Now you can play all the modes from Super Sequence 1 & 2 to play an amazing assortment of challenging levels. Combine your favorites modes to create over 450 ways to play! Now including songbird and farm animal themes.
